title: Back on Track
author: JGray
text:
Hidden name: Tanya

And here we go!

Things are better for Keith's household than expected. The problem turned out to be more easily treated than anticipated.

In the meanwhile, I've seen Captain America 2: Winter Solider and I'm caught up on Agents of SHIELD. Wow. Twists!

Speaking of twist... meet our new bad guys!

See you Monday.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: AHHH MANDRAKE!!!! *wants to go Hulk on the twisted little gnome-man*

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: That flashbang kind of looks like a thermal detonator...

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: There will be hurtingness in the not-too-distant future, methinks.

replies.author: Jasae Bushae*Guest*
replies.text: huh, A device that can knock out both electronics and organics...
